meanings.sent1: The bird will nidate its eggs in the nest.

meanings.sent3: The hen decided to nidate her eggs in the flowerpot.

meanings.sent5: The fish nidated her eggs among the rocks, hidden from predators.

meanings.sent1: The archaeologist will nidate the artifact in the museum.
